Subject: Invitation to discuss Urban Foraging on the "Hobby Horizons" podcast

Hi Lena,

I’m Alex Rivera, host of the "Hobby Horizons" podcast where we explore the world’s most fascinating niche hobbies. I’ve been following your work with "City Harvest" and was blown away by the way you make urban foraging accessible and sustainable.

We’re planning an upcoming episode titled “Urban Foraging: Harvesting the City’s Hidden Bounty,” and I believe your expertise and storytelling would be a perfect fit for our listeners who are eager to learn how to safely and responsibly forage in their own neighborhoods.

Would you be interested in joining me for a 30‑minute conversation? We can record at a time that works best for you, and I’ll gladly share the episode across all our channels.

Looking forward to the possibility of featuring you!

Best regards,
Alex Rivera
Host, Hobby Horizons
alex@hobbyhorizons.com
